dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6414 IH: Innovation and Development in Ecuador Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Salazar (for herself, Mr. Espaillat, Mr. Buchanan, Mr. Davidson, and Mr. Gallego) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To make Ecuador eligible for designation as a beneficiary country under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Innovation and Development in Ecuador Act of 2023.

section.header: Eligibility of Ecuador for designation as a beneficiary country under Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act

subsection.text: Section 212(b) of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act (19 U.S.C. 2702(b)) is amended by inserting after Dominica the following new item:

It is the sense of Congress that the President should, not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, issue a proclamation designating Ecuador as a CBTPA beneficiary country (as such term is defined in section 213(b)(5)(B) of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act (19 U.S.C. 2703(b)(5)(B)).
